testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test11@example.com" field.............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid "test11@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"..............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page again...........................................passed When user login with invalid "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".............passed And user press on login button again........................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_Currencies | user could select different currencies
testcase.name: user could switch to euro currency
testcase.system-out: When user select euro option................................................passed Then euro symbol is displayed...............................................passed When user select dollar option..............................................passed Then dollar option is displayed back........................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | User could search for products using keywords or SKU
testcase.name: user search for product using keyword
testcase.system-out: When user search for item with keyword "Nokia Lumia 1020"...................passed And user click on search button.............................................passed Then user should see the search result......................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | User could search for products using keywords or SKU
testcase.name: user search for product using SKU
testcase.system-out: When user type a Product Sku "AP_MBP_13"....................................passed And user click on the search button.........................................passed And user click on the shown product.........................................passed Then user should see the result of the SKU search...........................passed

testcase.classname: F05_Hover | user could hover on a product and choose sub category
testcase.name: user select sub product from the main categories using hover actions
testcase.system-out: When user hover over computers products icon................................passed And user click on the subcategory Notebooks.................................passed Then user should be directed to Notebooks page..............................passed
